T02D1776:270b-1: shr'i bhatta r'a ka ma h'a k'a la sto tra /
T02D1776:270b-3: rje btsun dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa /
T02D1776:270b-4: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1776:270b-5: bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus
T02D1776:270b-6: myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad
T02D1776:270b-8: rab 'jigs mdog gnag gzugs thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing
T02D1776:270b-9: dbu skra dmar ser 'jigs pa'i me dpung nang bzhugs
T02D1776:270b-11: ha h'um phem gyi sgra yis lha dang lha min
T02D1776:270b-12: tshogs ni 'dar zhing 'dud pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas
T02D1776:270b-14: bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus
T02D1776:270b-15: myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad
T02D1776:270b-17: skye rags dril bu g-yer ka sil sil da ma
T02D1776:270b-18: ru mi ti ti h'um ha rnga sgra thog gi
T02D1776:270b-20: sgra rnams sgrogs shing mnyam dang mi mnyam gar byed
T02D1776:270b-21: pa yi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas
T02D1776:270b-23: bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus
T02D1776:270b-24: myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad
T02D1776:270b-26: thung zhing sbom la spyan gsum me tog ban du
T02D1776:270b-27: ka ltar dmar bas bgegs rnams skrag cing sdang mdzad
T02D1776:270b-28: ljags ni glog ltar 'khyug / mche ba rnam par
T02D1776:270b-29: gtsigs pas ma rungs gdug pa can gyi sha dang
T02D1776:270b-30: rus pa krum krum 'cha' zhing lha ba zhag 'jib
T02D1776:270b-31: pa // bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can
T02D1776:270b-32: ma lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun
T02D1776:270b-33: gsol mdzad nag po chen po ni //
T02D1776:270b-34: phyag rkya lnga dang klu brgyad kyis brgyan stag lpags
T02D1776:270b-35: ske rags dang ni sku smad dkris shing mi bskyod
T02D1776:270b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs rnams sku las spro zhing
T02D1776:270b-38: mi yi rgyu mas sprel ba'i mgo yi phreng ba
T02D1776:271a-0: bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma @271a * //
T02D1776:271a-1: lus myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad nag po chen po chen po ni //
T02D1776:271a-2: drag po dang ni chu bdag bzlog par dka' ba'i
T02D1776:271a-3: tshogs rnams zhal du gsol mdzad phyag g-yon rtse gsum
T02D1776:271a-5: gshin rje'i lce 'dra'i gri gug dang ni ral gri phyag g-yas bsnams //
T02D1776:271a-6: gdug pa can rnams rlog mdzad sdig pa ring du spong //
T02D1776:271a-7: bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs kyi sems can ma lus
T02D1776:271a-8: myur du tshar bcad bsad nas khrag rgyun gsol mdzad
T02D1776:271a-10: rig byed ces pa'i lha mo brgyad dang rol ba'i
T02D1776:271a-11: rje btsun rdo rje nag po chen po sangs rgyas
T02D1776:271a-13: gang gis nyin mtshan rtag tu 'di bton bsgrub pa'i
T02D1776:271a-14: don rnams grub dang sems can ma lus khyad par
T02D1776:271a-17: // / dpal rdo rje nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1776:271a-18: bong thung gsus 'phyang mdog gnag ral pa kham nag gyen du brjes //
T02D1776:271a-19: 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis lha min dgra bgegs ma lus sreg par byed //
T02D1776:271a-20: drag po'i zhal gyis bdud rtsi gsol mdzad mgo bo gcod mdzad pa //
T02D1776:271a-21: bzhad pa'i tshul gyis khro zhing gdug pa'i dgra rnams skrag mdzad pa //
T02D1776:271a-22: rked pa byin pa dril bu g-yer ga'i tshogs kyis sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1776:271a-23: ti ti dang ni h'um hat ru yi sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D1776:271a-24: zhal nas tor ke na ni tor ra ki ni ki skra ni //
T02D1776:271a-25: sgrogs shing zhabs kyis mnyam dang mi mnyam tshul du gar mdzad cing //
T02D1776:271a-26: ma mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dur khrod gnas na rol //
T02D1776:271a-27: ha ka h'um ka phem ka'i sgras ni lha dang lha min sregs //
T02D1776:271a-28: ma lus dgra bgegs tshogs kyi srog la myur du sogs byed cing //
T02D1776:271a-29: nag po'i phyogs kyi dgra bgegs khrag gi rgyun ni zhal du gsol //
T02D1776:271a-30: nag po chen pos sgrub pa po yi bsam pa myur du sgrubs //
T02D1776:271a-31: spyan gsum me tog byi ru'i mdog ltar dmar zhing
T02D1776:271a-32: smin ma 'khyog / ljags ni glog ltar 'khyug pas
T02D1776:271a-33: bgegs kyi tshogs ni 'jigs shing skrag / zhal nas
T02D1776:271a-34: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pas dgra bgegs ma lus
T02D1776:271a-35: pa'i // sha rus rkang dmar krum krum gsol zhing lha bzhag ni 'jib //
T02D1776:271a-36: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs kyis ni sku smad yongs su dkris //
T02D1776:271b-0: phyag rgya lnga dang klu brgyad kyis brgyan @271b spyi bo nas //
T02D1776:271b-1: mi bskyod la sogs de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phro bar byed //
T02D1776:271b-2: rgyu ma mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la do shal byas //
T02D1776:271b-3: nag po drag pos chu bdag la sogs zhal du gsol bar mdzad //
T02D1776:271b-4: rtse gsum dang ni gdug pa'i khrag bkang thod pa g-yon na bsnams //
T02D1776:271b-5: gnod sbyin lce 'dra'i gri gug ral gri g-yas kyi phyag na 'dzin //
T02D1776:271b-6: gdug pa'i dgra rnams ring du sbong zhing rlog par mdzad pa khyod //
T02D1776:271b-7: lha mo brgyad kyis bskor zhing 'dir ni gar gyi tshul gyis bzhugs //
T02D1776:271b-8: nyin dang mtshan du sgrub pa'i don rnams ma lus mdzad pa la //
T02D1776:271b-9: sangs rgyas grags pa yis ni 'jig rten mgon po la zhus pa //
T02D1776:271b-10: ma lus sems can 'di dag rdo rje sa la rab 'god mdzad //
T02D1776:271b-11: rje btsun dpal nag po chen po bya rog ming
T02D1776:271b-12: can dang gdong can la bstod pa mkhas pa chen
T02D1776:271b-13: po rtsa mi sangs rgyas grags kyis bstod pa rdzogs
